column4: I prefer to let the Live CD set it up instead of having the user try to point to the right partitions.  Some are very new to this.. gotta go eat..
I actually had the partitioner lock up on me every time when I ran the dapper desktop install. I had to use the alternate install cd
you should always use gksudo for graphical programs otherwise the environment won't be setup properly
I have seen people suggest both, so wanted to clarify
